text:
Three hundred years ago, eight
heroes saved the world from
ruin.

The Professor is studying ways
of summoning warriors at will.

The Grave Knights continue to
protect the populace from
demonic beasts while preparing
to face the threat to the world.

Grave Knights have summoned
warriors from the Towers to form
their own units.

Who created the Graves and for
what purpose, remains a mystery.

Towers are also known as
"Graves".

Towers can be divided into two
types: "Divine Towers" and
"Demon Towers".

Imprisoned within Demon Towers
are demonic overlords & beasts.
Each nation is vying to obtain
their power.

The route to the top floor of a
Tower appears when a Grave
Knight sees a Vision.

[Quality of a Grave Knight]
The ability to see Visions.

The Grave Knights have decreed
that a Knight must always be
present when a Tower is climbed.

[Ren Dahao] Shen Du's master,
who suddenly vanished. Her
talent in astronomy earned her
trust in the Country of Dae.

[Polka Lynn Wood] Liz's older
brother and a former acrobat.
Though introverted, he became
a Grave Knight to find Liz.

[Liz Lynn Wood] Polka's
younger sister. Cheerful and
outgoing, she is the opposite
of her reserved brother.

[Shen Du]
An astronomer also known as
"The Eyes of the Owl". Quite
the romanticist.

[Valdor]
Commissioner of the Grave
Knights. Admires Boston,
legendary hero of the Lobsters.

[Faerie (Brownie)]
A foulmouthed yet compassionate
surviving member of the faeries.
Faithful attendant to Valdor.

[Tu Kwai]
Leader of Dae, a major power of
the east. Capable of quick
attacks despite being tiny.

[Zenon Ausbach] Descendant of
Mikhail and current Marquis of
Loanne. First to sense the
changes around the world.

[The Wicked Witch of the East]
A mysterious witch who lives in
the caverns in the east. Able to
summon dark fire from the Abyss.

[Karman]
A young man hailed as a prodigy
as a child, he now serves as an
aide to Zenon.

[Don Scaccini] A big-time dealer
who operates out of the Great
Arch. His hobby is collecting
endangered species.

[Barthelemy] Ringmaster of
the circus in which Polka and
Liz performed. Works as an
assassin on the side.

[Madeleine]
A swordswoman with Gessian
blood, she is said to be the
reincarnation of Khalid.

[The Rise of Morastrum]
A calamity that occurs once
every three centuries, killing
all life born in that year.

[Maritime Mobile Fortress
Vanguard] One of the cities that
appeared in RS3. Now a base for
many Grave Knights and warriors.

[Astronomer]
One who studies the positions
and movements of celestial
objects by profession.

[Vision]
A glimpse into the past of
one who is imprisoned on the
top floor of a Tower.

[Doors of Light and Dark]
Located on the top floor of
Towers where Otherworld Warriors
and beasts are held prisoner.

[Climbing a Tower]
Liberating those imprisoned
beyond the doors on the top
floor of Towers.

[The Seven Heroes]
Enemy characters that appeared
in "Romancing SaGa2".

[The Four Sinistrals]
Enemy characters that appeared
in "Romancing SaGa3".

Study your enemy and target
their weaknesses when choosing
which skills to use.

You can copy a party at the
Edit Parties screen.

[Weak] means the target of an
attack is weak to that attack,
so it causes more damage.

[Resist] means the target of
an attack is resistant to
that attack, so it causes
less damage.

Start off by battling over and
over, which will increase your
characters' attributes.

Enemies won't become tougher
even as the number of battles
increases.

During a battle, tap and hold
on an enemy to see more
information about them.

Characters that are away on
Expeditions can also participate
in battles.

When a character joins you, it is
recommended to send them on
Expeditions first.

It's also important to sometimes
take a step back and regroup 
before fighting further battles.

If your party gets defeated,
try doing an instant Expedition.

If your party gets defeated,
try enhancing your Styles.

Heading out to eliminate
Garuda Wings is a good way to
get started.

Getting defeated or retreating
doesn't consume much stamina.

Sending out multiple characters
on Expeditions is recommended.

When warriors join you, it's
important to train them first.

Defeating powerful enemies
makes it easier for your
characters to grow.

When you use a skill, you might
[Grasp] a new one.

At the end of a battle, you
might [Learn] a new spell.

During an OverDrive Combo, your
attributes increase temporarily.

Using a skill or spell may
result in them ranking up.

You can increase Combat Power
by winning battles or enhancing
Styles, etc.

Which skills and spells to
inherit is up to you.

[STR]
Affects attacks with Swords,
G. Swords, Axes, Clubs, M. Arts,
Spears, etc.

[END]
Affects defense against skills.

[DEX]
Affects attack accuracy,
as well as attacks with
Guns, S. Swords, and Bows.

[AGI]
Affects evasion, turn order,
M. Arts attacks, and attack
accuracy.

[INT] Affects chance of
inflicting status ailments and
resistance/attribute changes,
spell strength/accuracy, etc.

[WIL] Affects chance of
resisting status ailments and
resistance/attribute changes,
and defense against spells.

[LOV]
One may feel love through 
spending a lot of time with
another.

[CHA]
Affects the success rate of
inflicting status ailments and
the recovery amount from healing.

Hector can inherit Orion's
skills and spells.

Alkaiser can inherit Red's
skills and spells.

Black can inherit Herman's
skills and spells.

If your party gets defeated,
try changing your formation.

When you awaken a skill or
spell, you can activate it in
fewer turns.

When it comes to skills and
spells, there are close range
attacks and long range
attacks.

Attribute gains vary according
to Style growth tendency.

Styles that learn recovery
spells should be developed
sooner rather than later.

The products sold in the Daily
Shop change over time.

Defend against the Maelstrom
attack by using a Style with
high cold resistance.

The Weekly Shop is updated
every <mon,01:00> at [01:00] <tz>.

Accessories mainly provide
resistance against status
ailments.

Skeletal enemies (such as Eerie
Skull) are weak to heat and
sun attacks.

Fish enemies (such as
Barbarricuda) are weak
to blunt, cold and lightning
attacks.

Snake enemies (such as Viper)
are weak to cold and lightning
attacks.

Beastman enemies (such as
Hooligan) are weak to heat,
cold and lightning attacks.

Plant enemies (such as Creeper)
are weak to heat attacks.

Human enemies (such as Jester)
are weak to slash and shadow
attacks.

Aquatic enemies (such as Sea
Slug) are weak to pierce, cold
and lightning attacks.

Fae enemies (such as Sidhe)
are weak to slash attacks.

Insect enemies (such as Bee)
are weak to blunt and cold
attacks.

Undead enemies (such as Corpse)
are weak to pierce, heat and
sun attacks.

Demon enemies (such as Jam)
are weak to sun attacks.

Inorganic enemies (such as
Gel) are weak to heat, cold,
lightning, sun and shadow
attacks.

Avian enemies (such as Bat)
are weak to pierce attacks.

Reptile/Amphibian enemies (such
as Wrapper) are weak to cold and
lightning attacks.

As your Master Level increases,
so does the damage you do with
each weapon type.
The Zweig Battle Coliseum is open every <fri,01:00> [01:00] - <mon,01:00> [01:00] (<tz>).

Your Master Level increases as
you develop Styles. The more
Styles you develop, the better.

Use Styles that provide
resistance against powerful
foes' attacks in battles.

Normal Main Quests have a
higher chance of giving out
B rank weapons.

Hard Main Quests have a
higher chance of giving out
A rank weapons.

Even if your Life Points (LP)
reach 0, they'll recover after
the battle.

Hector can inherit Orion's
skills and spells.

Alkaiser can inherit Red's
skills and spells.

Black can inherit Herman's
skills and spells.

Awakening skills and spells is
always a good idea.

Don't forget that skills and
spells can be inherited.

Remember to pay attention to
your abilities while battling.

Some Styles will likely need
to change how they fight upon
inheriting certain skills or
spells.

Defend better against attacks
by choosing your armor according
to your enemy.

If your attributes start to
increase less frequently, try
developing other characters
instead.

Enemies won't become tougher
even as the number of battles
increases.

Some materials for awakening
skills and spells can be
obtained from Hard/Very Hard
Main Quests.

Spell Styles are a good choice
when taking on Golden Baums.

During a battle, tap and hold
on an enemy to see more
information about them.

Challenge [Explore the Forest of
Mystery] on a daily basis to
earn rewards.

Products sold in the Daily Shop
change over time.

The Weekly Shop is updated
every <mon,01:00> at [01:00] <tz>.

Styles that can learn recovery
spells should be developed
sooner rather than later.

Characters that are away on
Expeditions can also participate
in battles.

goes up, so does its efficacy.

Body Armor mainly reduces slash
and blunt damage.

Heavy Armor mainly reduces
slash and pierce damage.

Light Armor mainly reduces
blunt and pierce damage.

Robes mainly reduce heat, cold
and lightning damage.

Helmets (Gear) reduce blunt
damage.

Gloves (Gear) reduce slash
damage.

Greaves (Gear) reduce pierce
damage.

Shirts (Gear) reduce sun
and shadow damage.

resistance against status
ailments.

If you want to get stronger,
going on Expeditions repeatedly
is recommended!

Start using
[Instant Expedition Tickets]
from the beginning of the game.
